name: Mononobe no Futo teaches you about Daoism
name_original: Mononobe no Futo teaches you about Daoism
description:
Mononobe no Futo briefly tells you about Daoism/Taoism in the hopes of you reading about it in the future.

Fan-work of Touhou Project, Touhou Project belongs to Team Shanghai Alice which is not affiliated with this short game.

Dev notes:

"made this thing in rpg maker mz and honestly the reason the file size is wayyy larger than it should be is because of a file called nw.dll which is like a whole mini browser and it's only purpose is to run the game. Oh right and if you want to be serious about learning Daoism you should do it by yourself and don't base it off of a touhou fangame."

Credits:

RPG Maker MZ plugins by Moghunter (@moghunter1)

Discord: https://discord.gg/dvxz33CQhU
